title: Maternal Caress
medium: drypoint, soft ground etching and color aquatint on paper
provenance_text:
Mary Cassatt [1844-1926]. Harris Whittemore [1864-1927], Naugatuck, CT, (L.1384a) until 1927; Estate of Harris Whittemore, 1927 until January 17, 1949; sold at Parke-Bernet Galleries, Inc., New York, NY, January 17, 1949, no. 55 [1]; Charles Sessler, Philadelphia PA [2]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, June 1949. 

Notes:
[1]. Sale entitled "The Etched Work of Whistler and Mary Cassatt from the Well-Known Collection of the Late Harris Whittemore, Part I" held on January 17 and 18, 1949.
[2]. The print was received at the the museum on February 3, 1949.
